publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-138 Tavish Scott: Highlands and Islands Passenger Transport Authority—That the Parliament requires the Transport and Environment Committee to consider and make recommendations on the establishment of a Highlands and Islands Passenger Transport Authority, to oversee Caledonian MacBrayne, Northern Isles Shipping services, Highlands and Islands Rail, Bus and Air services and other Highlands and Islands transport needs, as a first step in delivering integrated rural transport policy. Supported by: Mr Jamie Stone*, George Lyon*, Mr John Munro*

Supported by: Mr Jamie Stone, George Lyon, Mr John Munro

S1M-138 Highlands and Islands Passenger Transport Authority (lodged on 9 September 1999) Nora Radcliffe*

Supported by: Mr Jamie Stone, George Lyon, Mr John Munro, Nora Radcliffe
